name: py-gql
description:
This is a GraphQL client for Python. Plays nicely with graphene,
graphql-core, graphql-js and any other GraphQL implementation compatible
with the spec. GQL architecture is inspired by React-Relay and Apollo-
Client.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-aiohttp
dependencies.description:
Supports both client and server side of HTTP protocol. Supports both
client and server Web-Sockets out-of-the-box and avoids Callbacks.
Provides Web-server with middlewares and plugable routing.

dependencies.name: py-graphql-core
dependencies.description:
GraphQL-core 3 is a Python 3.6+ port of GraphQL.js, the JavaScript
reference implementation for GraphQL, a query language for APIs created
by Facebook.

dependencies.name: py-websockets
dependencies.description:
websockets is a library for building WebSocket servers and clients in
Python with a focus on correctness and simplicity.

dependencies.name: py-yarl
dependencies.description: The module provides handy URL class for URL parsing and changing.

dependencies.name: py-promise
dependencies.description:
This is a implementation of Promises in Python. It is a super set of
Promises/A+ designed to have readable, performant code and to provide
just the extensions that are absolutely necessary for using promises in
Python.

dependent_to.name: py-wandb
dependent_to.description: A tool for visualizing and tracking your machine learning experiments.

dependent_to.name: py-sierrapy
dependent_to.description: A Client of HIVdb Sierra GraphQL Webservice
